sentences.en: Everyone in the studio burst into hysterical laughter .
sentences.cn: 演播室里的每个人都爆发出一阵狂笑。

sentences.en: He became almost hysterical when I told him.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他时，他几乎要发疯了。

sentences.en: He is hysterical at the sight of the photo.
sentences.cn: 他一看到那张照片就异常激动.

sentences.en: He made headlines and received hysterical hate mail.
sentences.cn: 他成了新闻人物，收到了疯狂的攻击性邮件。

sentences.en: He veered between calm acceptance and hysterical accusations.
sentences.cn: 他时而泰然处之,时而歇斯底里地指责.

sentences.en: Her extraordinary accent made the whole class hysterical.
sentences.cn: 她又读起“喜儿”来了.这样的怪读法,全课堂都笑得颤栗起来.

sentences.en: His hysterical laughter made everybody stunned.
sentences.cn: 他那歇斯底里的笑声使所有的人不知所措.

sentences.en: I had to rush to the loo to avoid an attack of hysterical giggles.
sentences.cn: 我不得不冲向卫生间，以免遭到别人的疯狂嘲笑。

sentences.en: I suffered bouts of really hysterical depression.
sentences.cn: 我曾患阵发的严重癔病性抑郁症。

sentences.en: Janet became hysterical and began screaming.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特歇斯底里起来，开始尖叫。

sentences.en: Paul Mazursky was Master of Ceremonies, and he was pretty hysterical.
sentences.cn: 保罗·马祖尔斯基担任司仪，他简直把人笑坏了。

sentences.en: Police and bodyguards had to protect him as the almost hysterical crowds struggled to approach him.
sentences.cn: 当情绪几近失控的人群拼命想接近他时，警察和保镖不得不保护他。

sentences.en: The children began to laugh, hysterical with joy.
sentences.cn: 孩子们大笑起来, 欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: The doctor slapped the hysterical child to make him calmer.
sentences.cn: 医生拍了拍那个歇斯底里发作的孩子,使他静下来.

sentences.en: The movie was hysterical. I couldn't stop laughing.
sentences.cn: 那电影太滑稽了.我忍不住大笑.

sentences.en: They became hysterical after the accident.
sentences.cn: 事故发生后他们变得歇斯底里.

癔病患者；歇斯底里患者
歇斯底里症的发作；发疯

trans.tran_cn: 情绪异常激动的，歇斯底里般的，癔病的，癔病性
trans.tran_en: unable to control your behaviour or emotions because you are very upset, afraid, excited etc
